MergeMEDfiles Class Reference

Class MergeMEDfiles
Merge several MED files written by several procs into a single field object
with a proper underlying mesh (no duplicate nodes)
Usage in data file
Merge_MED [NOM_DU_CAS||med_files_base_name] [all_times||last_time]. More...

#include <MergeMEDfiles.h>

Detailed Description

Class MergeMEDfiles
Merge several MED files written by several procs into a single field object
with a proper underlying mesh (no duplicate nodes)
Usage in data file
Merge_MED [NOM_DU_CAS||med_files_base_name] [all_times||last_time].
